stimulusHtml: Which of the following historical continuities is best reflected in the image?

features.html:
LIU GUANDAO, YUAN DYNASTY CHINESE COURT PAINTER, WHILING AWAY THE SUMMER, PAINTED SCROLL, CIRCA 1280

The Picture Art Collection / Alamy Stock Photo

 

The image depicts a Chinese Confucian scholar and two female attendants.

choicesHtml: Chinese art reflected European methods of painting.
Chinese art continued to emphasize traditional subjects and styles.
Chinese art incorporated elements of Central Asian nomadic life.
Chinese art continued to stress the importance of technological innovation.
